HTTP Routing Table

/forums | /permissions | /rules | /user_classes | /users
 
/forums
GET /forums/(int:id)
GET /forums/categories
GET /forums/polls/(int:id)
GET /forums/posts/(int:id)
GET /forums/threads/(int:id)
POST /forums
POST /forums/categories
POST /forums/polls/choices/(int:choice_id)/vote
POST /forums/posts
POST /forums/threads
POST /forums/threads/(int:id)/notes
PUT /forums/(int:id)
PUT /forums/categories/(int:id)
PUT /forums/polls/(int:id)
PUT /forums/posts/(int:id)
PUT /forums/threads/(int:id)
DELETE /forums/(int:id)
DELETE /forums/categories/(int:id)
DELETE /forums/posts/(int:id)
DELETE /forums/threads/(int:id)
 
/permissions
GET /permissions
 
/rules
GET /rules
GET /rules/(section)
 
/user_classes
GET /user_classes
GET /user_classes/(int:user_class_id)
POST /user_classes
PUT /user_classes/(int:user_class_id)
DELETE /user_classes/(int:user_class_id)
 
/users
GET /users/(int:user_id)
GET /users/api_keys
GET /users/api_keys/(hash)
GET /users/api_keys/user/(int:user_id)
GET /users/invite
GET /users/invites
GET /users/invites/user/(int:user_id)
POST /users
POST /users/api_keys
POST /users/invites
PUT /users/(int:user_id)/moderate
PUT /users/(int:user_id)/settings
PUT /users/settings
DELETE /users/api_keys
DELETE /users/api_keys/all
DELETE /users/api_keys/all/user/(int:user_id)
DELETE /users/invite
